unnormalised: The monsoon is finally here with full force! Expect waterlogging in low-lying areas. Commuters, plan your travel keeping in mind the predicted rainfall. Schools and colleges may announce holidays; keep an eye out for updates before 7:00 AM tomorrow.
normalised: The monsoon is finally here with full force! Expect waterlogging in low-lying areas. Commuters, plan your travel keeping in mind the predicted rainfall. Schools and colleges may announce holidays; keep an eye out for updates before seven A-M tomorrow.

unnormalised: The weather forecast predicts a 90% chance of rain on Sat and Sun, with thunderstorms likely after 2:00 PM. So, stay safe, stay dry, and enjoy the much-needed respite from the heat!
normalised: The weather forecast predicts a ninety percent chance of rain on Sat and Sun, with thunderstorms likely after two P-M. So, stay safe, stay dry, and enjoy the much-needed respite from the heat!
